CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(clcommon__Contact__r.Housing_Status__c, 'Renting'), ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.Primary_loan_purpose_list__c, 'Investment'), Living_Expense_Section_Render__c == TRUE), OR(Rent_Board_Monthly_Amount__c == 0, Rent_Board_Monthly_Amount__c == null), FALSE)
CustomField.label: Rent/Board Warning Check
